org.apache.ambari.server.api.services

Class HostComponentService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.api.services.BaseService
      • org.apache.ambari.server.api.services.HostComponentService

  • public class HostComponentService
extends BaseService
    Service responsible for host_components resource requests.

        Handles POST /clusters/{clusterID}/hosts/{hostID}/host_components Create host components by specifying an array of host components in the http body. This is used to create multiple host components in a single request.
        Parameters:

        headers - http headers
        ui - uri info
        Returns:
        status code only, 201 if successful
